pullRequest.title: [1356] API -> Internal converters required for validator API.
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
A WIP commit containing some API -> Internal object converters required by upcoming validator APIs.
Fixed Issue(s)
Part of fix for #1356

commit.message: [1356] API -> Internal converters required for validator API.

nodes.bodyText:
we could potentially use the defined constants when creating a SSZList since at this point we can identify which one is appropriate
Constants.MAX_VALIDATORS_PER_COMMITTEE appears to be the best max size in this case. not sure if @ajsutton has a preference re. using the current size, or the defined constants.
If we decide to use constants, blocks/BeaconBlockBody has all the constants in line comments with each list.
